name: Obsolete Souls
description: Join an unfortunate cast of characters in a wild story of trusting fate. Upon being forced into a journey to save the planet, they realize that saving their planet isn't enough. Their entire universe is in danger. Play through the hardships that these characters face as they deal with failure, injustice, and regret, as they attempt to save their home from the gods of the past. Obsolete Souls™ is sure to please fans of turn based role-playing games while also adding a touch of hip-hop!
